error.signature: error: unable to recognize: no matches for kind "X" in version "v1alpha1"
error.regex: no matches for kind.*in version|version.*not served|apiVersion.*not supported

verdict.summary: CRD API version deprecated or not served. Cluster upgraded and old API version removed.

dead_ends.why_fails: Dangerous and loses features from newer versions
Bypasses validation but API server still rejects the version

workarounds.action: Update the apiVersion in your manifests to the current served version
workarounds.how:
# Old: apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
# New: apiVersion: apps/v1

workarounds.action: Use kubectl convert to migrate manifests: kubectl convert -f old.yaml --output-version apps/v1
Check deprecation notices: kubectl api-resources to see current API groups
workarounds.how: kubectl api-resources to see current API groups
